ing: 1/4 cup white sugar, or to taste
1 (12 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
1 large Jonagold apple, peeled and chopped
1 (4 ounce) jar maraschino cherries, drained and halved (optional)
des: "This creamy, satisfying summer salad or dessert is also a family favorite at Thanksgiving. My mother-in-law could be counted on to bring this dish to all our family functions."
ins: Beat the cream cheese and sugar together in a large bowl. On high speed, beat in the whipped topping. Fold in the bananas, pineapple, fruit cocktail, apple, and coconut. If desired, mix in the maraschino cherries, pecans, and raisins. Pour the salad into a serving bowl, and chill 1 hour before serving.
